section.title: Secure World Writable Files
section.para:
Removes world writable permission on files. Normally, any user on the system can alter data in world writable files. If the file is a program, world writable permission could lead to a larger compromise of the systemâ€™s integrity.
world-writable

Removing world writable permission on files is recommended. If this breaks a third-party application, you can undo the operation. However, the third-party application vendor should be encouraged to provide a better solution.
